augmented_texts: DNA industrial plant TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION B & W / DNAP QUARTERLY REVIEW MEETING OCTOBER 23, 1990 576102973
DNA PLANT TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION B & W / DNAP QUARTERLY reassessment MEETING oct 23, 1990 576102973
summary: DNA PLANT TECHNOLOGY CORporation was founded in 1990. The company was formed to develop and sell DNA technology to other companies. In 1990, the company began developing DNA for use in DNA sequencing. DNA was also used to test new DNA-based DNA technologies.
